translations: 控告，指控；指责，谴责，归咎于

sentences.sentence: He laughs loudly when I accuse him of fibbing.
sentences.translation: 我指控他撒谎时，他笑得很大声。

sentences.sentence: His father would accuse him of neglecting his filial duties.
sentences.translation: 他父亲会指控他没有尽孝。

sentences.sentence: Politicians accuse the media of talking up the possibility of a riot.
sentences.translation: 政客们谴责媒体夸大骚乱的可能性。
